title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bounty Bonuses
content:
Bail enforcement can be a surprisingly lucrative undertaking, especially when all Standard and Most Wanted Bounty Targets are dishing out Double Rewards. Securing six Bounty Targets of any kind will complete the Weekly Challenge and get you an additional GTA$100,000.

Visit Maze Bank Foreclosures to purchase a Bail Office and get started.
